slides.title: 2D Shapes - Square & Rectangle
slides.content:
**Square:**
- Perimeter = 4 × side
- Area = side²
- Diagonal = side × √2

**Rectangle:**
- Perimeter = 2(length + breadth)
- Area = length × breadth
- Diagonal = √(l² + b²)

slides.title: 2D Shapes - Circle
slides.content:
**Circle:**
- Circumference = 2πr
- Area = πr²

**Semi-circle:**
- Perimeter = πr + 2r
- Area = πr²/2

**Ring/Annulus:**
Area = π(R² - r²)
where R = outer radius, r = inner radius

slides.title: 3D Shapes - Cube & Cuboid
slides.content:
**Cube (side = a):**
- Volume = a³
- Surface Area = 6a²
- Diagonal = a√3

**Cuboid (l, b, h):**
- Volume = l × b × h
- Surface Area = 2(lb + bh + hl)
- Diagonal = √(l² + b² + h²)

slides.title: 3D Shapes - Cylinder
slides.content:
**Cylinder (radius r, height h):**

**Curved Surface Area = 2πrh**

**Total Surface Area = 2πr(r + h)**

**Volume = πr²h**

slides.title: 3D Shapes - Cone & Sphere
slides.content:
**Cone (radius r, height h, slant l):**
- l = √(r² + h²)
- Curved Surface Area = πrl
- Total Surface Area = πr(r + l)
- Volume = (1/3)πr²h

**Sphere (radius r):**
- Surface Area = 4πr²
- Volume = (4/3)πr³
